dict.string: word=${TM_SELECTED_TEXT:-$TM_CURRENT_WORD} perldoc -u -f "$word" 2>/dev/null | pod2html --q --title "Perl Documentation - $word" 2>/dev/null | sed -e 's|<a href="#(item_)?([^"]+)">|<a href="http://perldoc.perl.org/search.html?q=$2">|g' if [[ -e "${TM_DIRECTORY}/pod2htmd.tmp" ]] then unlink "${TM_DIRECTORY}/pod2htmd.tmp" fi if [[ -e "${TM_DIRECTORY}/pod2htmi.tmp" ]] then unlink "${TM_DIRECTORY}/pod2htmi.tmp" fi
